hero.title: Design Beautiful Cards That Spark Joy
hero.description: Cardio is a magical digital card builder that brings your imagination to life. Our platform empowers you to effortlessly design personalized and captivating cards that leave a lasting impression.

about.title: About Cardio
about.description: Get Started Creating stunning and memorable digital cards for all occasions.
steps: Sign up for a Cardio account.
Explore our collection of stunning card templates.
Customize your chosen template with our intuitive drag and drop editor.
Add personal touches like images, videos, and music to make your cards unique.
Preview and share your masterpiece with friends and family.

features.title: Key Features
list: Intuitive drag and drop editor for seamless card customization
A treasure trove of gorgeous templates for every special moment
Unleash your creativity with customizable fonts, colors, and backgrounds
Elevate your cards with rich media: add images, videos, and music
Responsive design ensures your cards look perfect on any device
Spread the joy by sharing your cards through social media or email
Collaborate with friends and family on designing the perfect card
Track the performance and analytics of your cards to see the smiles you've created
Seamless integration with popular design tools like Canva and Adobe Creative Cloud

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your style and budget.

plans.name: Starter
features: Basic customization options to personalize your cards
Unlimited media uploads to make your cards pop
Standard support to assist you along the way

plans.name: Pro
features: Unlock our premium collection of 200+ dazzling card templates
Advanced customization options for the most intricate designs
Unleash the full potential with unlimited media uploads
Priority support to ensure your creativity never hits a roadblock
Access to exclusive premium templates that will make jaws drop

plans.name: Enterprise
features: Tailored card templates designed to perfectly match your brand
Full access to all features and future updates
Dedicated account manager for personalized support
Advanced analytics and reporting to measure your card's success

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: We're here to assist you. Reach out to our friendly team for any inquiries or support.
